original_text: Fire started to burn its strongest branch. From there the fire destroyed its other branches and its fruit. No strong branch remained in the vine. Now there was nothing to make a ruler's stick of authority.” This is a funeral song. It tells a very sad story.’ Fire started to burn its strongest branch.
korean_text: 불이 그 가지 중 하나에서부터 나와 그 열매를 태우니 권세 잡은 자의 규가 될 만한 강한 가지가 없도다 하라 이것이 애가라 후에도 애가가 되리라

sentences.original_text: Fire started to burn its strongest branch.
sentences.korean_translation: 불이 그 가장 강한 가지를 태우기 시작했습니다.

sentences.original_text: From there the fire destroyed its other branches
No strong branch remained in the vine.
Now there was nothing to make a ruler's stick of authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 통치자의 권위 지팡이를 만들 것이 아무것도 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: It tells a very sad story.
